title: Mass Spec Sample Prep
author: Opentrons
description: This protocols allows the robot to transfer liquid from four 96-well source plates (slot 1, 2, 3, 4) to individual well of a target 96-well plate (slot 5) using a P10 single-channel pipette.
process:
Upload your CSV file following the format below.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Transfer appropriate volume from the appropriate source well to the target well as depicted in the CSV file.
notes: Follow this format for the CSV file:

markdown.title: Mass Spec Sample Prep
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocols allows the robot to transfer liquid from four 96-well source plates (slot 1, 2, 3, 4) to individual well of a target 96-well plate (slot 5) using a P10 single-channel pipette.
markdown.process:
1. Upload your CSV file following the format below.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. Transfer appropriate volume from the appropriate source well to the target well as depicted in the CSV file.
markdown.notes:
* Follow this format for the CSV file:


![csv_example](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/LifeGene_Mass_Spec_Sample_Prep.png)
